ship_traits.Adaptive Armour: Halve Damage and Crew, round down.
ship_traits.Afterburner: All Power to Engines! doubles Speed
ship_traits.Agile: Need only move ¼ of speed beforeturning, 1” between turns
ship_traits.Anti-Fighter X: Has X dice to roll against fighters hulls to destroy them, 2” range
ship_traits.Carrier X: Can launch or recover X squadrons per turn
ship_traits.Command +X: Plus X to initiative. Not cumulative, lost when crippled or skeleton crewed.
ship_traits.Dodge X: 1d6 per hit, if result >= X, attack missed. Lost if Adrift or not moved.
ship_traits.Escort: May lend Anti-Fighter dice to ships within 8” and LOS
ship_traits.Fleet Carrier: Plus 1 bonus to dogfight. Repair destroyed flights within 30”. See rules.
ship_traits.Flight Computer: Crew Quality never less than 4, no penalties for being reduced to Skeleton Crew
ship_traits.Gravitiv Energy Grid X: Reduces damage and crew taken by X. critical hits not affected
ship_traits.Lumbering: May not continue move after turning, one turn only; may not be lost
ship_traits.Self Repairing X: Plus 1 to Damage Control. In the end phase, 1d6 rolled,  listed Damage repaired
ship_traits.Scout: 36” range. Instead of special action my roll CQ 8+ to reduce stealth by 1 or to allow friendly ships to re-roll one weapon AD against target that turn (not beams).
ship_traits.Shields X/X: Stops X hits (hits multiplied by double etc), regenerates second number.
ship_traits.Stealth X: After an Attack has been declared only hits on X, if distance > 20” add 1 to X, if < 8” minus 1,  if target has already been hit –1 again

weapon_traits.Beam: Ignores Interceptors; hits on 4+, if hit, re-rolluntil no hits is scored; may only split fire iftargets are within 4 inches
weapon_traits.Double Damage: Damage and Crew x2, including CriticalDamage, always cause one Damage, even ifit is a Bulkhead hit
weapon_traits.Energy Mine: Nominate point within range, all objects within 3 inches receive damage, which ignores Stealth,Interceptors and Dodge traits. Cannot causecrits
weapon_traits.Gravitic Shifter: May turn enemy ship 45 degrees, opposed Crew Quality  check
weapon_traits.Mass Driver: Target must be Adrift or not moved. IgnoresShields, Interceptors and GEG.
weapon_traits.One-Shot: May only be used once. Not used if Stealthroll failed
weapon_traits.Orbital Bomb: May only be fired at planetary targets (troops and emplacements)
weapon_traits.Quad Damage: Damage and Crew damage  x 4, including criticaldamage. Causes 2 damage on Bulkhead hit.
weapon_traits.Slow Loading: May only fire every other turn, not fired if Stealth roll failed
weapon_traits.Triple Damage: Damage and Crew damage  x 3, including criticaldamage. Causes 1 damage on Bulkhead hit.
weapon_traits.Twin-Linked: Missed Attack dice may be re-rolled
